verses.roman:
evaṁ lakṣaṇa-lakṣyāṇi
purāṇāni purā-vidaḥ
munayo 'ṣṭādaśa prāhuḥ
kṣullakāni mahānti ca

synonyms: evam—in this way; lakṣaṇa-lakṣyāṇi—symptomized by their characteristics; purāṇāni—the Purāṇas; purā-vidaḥ—those who are expert in such ancient histories; munayaḥ—the sages; aṣṭādaśa—eighteen; prāhuḥ—say; kṣullakāni—minor; mahānti—great; ca—also.
translation: Sages expert in ancient histories have declared that the Purāṇas, according to their various characteristics, can be divided into eighteen major Purāṇas and eighteen secondary Purāṇas.
